quote: The ultimate tragedy is not the oppression and cruelty by the bad people but the silence over that by the good people.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: There is nothing either good or bad but thinking makes it so.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Goodness is about character - integrity, honesty, kindness, generosity, moral courage, and the like. More than anything else, it is about how we treat other people.
author: Dennis Prager

quote: Despite everything, I believe that people are really good at heart.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgment.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Good people do not need laws to tell them to act responsibly, while bad people will find a way around the laws.
author: Plato

quote: If you can't make it good, at least make it look good.
author: Bill Gates

quote: When I'm good, I'm very good. But when I'm bad I'm better.
author: Mae West

quote: The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who can do him absolutely no good.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: The fragrance of flowers spreads only in the direction of the wind. But the goodness of a person spreads in all directions.
author: Chanakya

quote: The more we come out and do good to others, the more our hearts will be purified, and God will be in them.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Every man is guilty of all the good he did not do.
author: Voltaire

quote: But I say to you, Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you, so that you may be sons of your Father who is in heaven; for he makes his sun rise on the evil and on the good, and sends rain on the just and on the unjust.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: A good beginning makes a good end.
author: Louis L'Amour

quote: It takes many good deeds to build a good reputation, and only one bad one to lose it.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Be sweet, be good, and honest always.
author: Emma Bunton

quote: If people are good only because they fear punishment, and hope for reward, then we are a sorry lot indeed.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Goodness is the only investment that never fails.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I object to violence because when it appears to do good, the good is only temporary; the evil it does is permanent.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: To be a good citizen, it's important to be able to put yourself in other people's shoes and see the big picture. If everything you see is rooted in your own identity, that becomes difficult or impossible.
author: Eli Pariser

quote: Good things do not come easy. The road is lined with pitfalls.
author: Desi Arnaz

quote: A good character is the best tombstone. Those who loved you and were helped by you will remember you when forget-me-nots have withered. Carve your name on hearts, not on marble.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Associate yourself with people of good quality, for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: The good old days are now.
author: Tom Clancy

quote: I'm convinced of this: Good done anywhere is good done everywhere. For a change, start by speaking to people rather than walking by them like they're stones that don't matter. As long as you're breathing, it's never too late to do some good.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I'd rather be lucky than good.
author: Lefty Gomez

quote: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
author: Bernard Meltzer

quote: Life comes from physical survival; but the good life comes from what we care about.
author: Rollo May

quote: Fun is good.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: There are three ingredients in the good life: learning, earning and yearning.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: In every age 'the good old days' were a myth. No one ever thought they were good at the time. For every age has consisted of crises that seemed intolerable to the people who lived through them.
author: Brooks Atkinson

quote: A man is called selfish not for pursuing his own good, but for neglecting his neighbor's.
author: Richard Whately

quote: The good and the wise lead quiet lives.
author: Euripides

quote: No one can be good for long if goodness is not in demand.
author: Bertolt Brecht

quote: A good scare is worth more to a man than good advice.
author: E. W. Howe

quote: A man has to live with himself, and he should see to it that he always has good company.
author: Charles Evans Hughes

quote: A man who is good enough to shed his blood for the country is good enough to be given a square deal afterwards.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Less is only more where more is no good.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Have a very good reason for everything you do.
author: Laurence Olivier

quote: The chief enemy of creativity is 'good' sense.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: He who stops being better stops being good.
author: Oliver Cromwell

quote: Learn to... be what you are, and learn to resign with a good grace all that you are not.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: The word 'good' has many meanings. For example, if a man were to shoot his grandmother at a range of five hundred yards, I should call him a good shot, but not necessarily a good man.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: The omission of good is no less reprehensible than the commission of evil.
author: Plutarch

quote: On the whole, human beings want to be good, but not too good, and not quite all the time.
author: George Orwell

quote: It takes a great man to be a good listener.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: All good things which exist are the fruits of originality.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: There has to be evil so that good can prove its purity above it.
author: Unknown

quote: Good advice is something a man gives when he is too old to set a bad example.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: A good indignation brings out all one's powers.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The crest and crowning of all good, Life's final star, is brotherhood.
author: Edwin Markham

quote: The 'good old times' - all times when old are good.
author: Lord Byron

quote: I have made good judgments in the past. I have made good judgments in the future.
author: Dan Quayle

quote: It's good to shut up sometimes.
author: Marcel Marceau

quote: That which is striking and beautiful is not always good, but that which is good is always beautiful.
author: Ninon de L'Enclos

quote: I know that every good and excellent thing in the world stands moment by moment on the razor-edge of danger and must be fought for.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: Good men are the stars, the planets of the ages wherein they live, and illustrate the times.
author: Ben Jonson

quote: No man or woman can be strong, gentle, pure, and good, without the world being better for it and without someone being helped and comforted by the very existence of that goodness.
author: Phillips Brooks
